content:
Q: I have lost my Student Card, where do I get a new one?
A: Please log a ticket here to request a replacement Student Card in the event you have lost or misplaced it. Please note there is a fee of €10 for the replacement of lost cards. Attendance Monitoring Attendance is monitored by scanning your student card against the card readers in the classroom before class.

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
